verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: a room full of Central Intelligence Agency employees] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: that they will play an integral role in ridding the world of the ISIS terror army] , and that he will give them a longer leash .
